provone:Program.description: A computational task that consumes and produces data: Can be atomic or composite:

provone:Port.description: Enables a Program to send or receive Entity items (Data, Visualization, or Document instances):

provone:Channel.description: Provides a connection between Ports that are defined for Programs, this ensures that we can see the number of steps as this provide the flow of the functions

provone:Execution.description: Represents the execution of a Program: If the Program is a Workflow, this is the trace:

provone:User.description: The person(s) responsible for the execution of an Execution: Subclass of prov:Agent:

provone:Data.description: Represents the basic unit of information consumed or produced by a Program: Subclass of provone:Entity

prov:Collection.description: An entity that provides a structure to some constituents, which are themselves entities:

prov:Association.description: An assignment of responsibility to an agent (User) for an activity (Execution), specifying a plan (Program):

prov:Usage.description: The beginning of utilizing an entity by an activity (Execution): Qualifies the 'used' relation:

prov:Generation.description: The completion of production of a new entity by an activity (Execution): Qualifies the 'wasGeneratedBy' relation:

eo:AITask.description: An AI task performed within a workflow, this contains all the AI related metadata and inputs

eo:ObjectRecord.description: A data record of in the workflow:

eo:generatedBy.description: The program was generated by this AITask

sio:SIO_000229.description: has output : usually output of a AITask is a Program

sio:SIO_000230.description: Indicates input data to an AITask, attributes of AITask

provone:hasInPort.description: Specifies the Ports of a particular Program that are used as input ports:
provone:hasInPort.reverse_description: The Program this Port serves as an input for:

provone:hasOutPort.description: Specifies the Ports of a particular Program that are used as output ports:
provone:hasOutPort.reverse_description: The Program this Port serves as an output for:

provone:connectsTo.description: Specifies the Channel that the given Port(s) connect to:
provone:connectsTo.reverse_description: The Port(s) that this Channel connects:

prov:used.description: States that an Execution made use of a particular Entity item as input:
prov:used.reverse_description: The Execution(s) that used this Entity:

prov:wasGeneratedBy.description: States that an Entity item was produced as an output of an Execution:
prov:wasGeneratedBy.reverse_description: The Entity/Entities generated by this Execution:

prov:wasAssociatedWith.description: States that a User was associated with a particular Execution (assignment of attribution):
prov:wasAssociatedWith.reverse_description: The Execution(s) this User was associated with:

prov:wasInformedBy.description: States that an Execution communicates with and is informed by another Execution:
prov:wasInformedBy.reverse_description: The Execution(s) that this Execution informed:

prov:qualifiedAssociation.description: Links an Execution to a detailed Association object, which specifies the agent (User) and plan (Program):

prov:agent.description: Links an Association to the agent (User) responsible:
prov:agent.reverse_description: The Association(s) in which this User acted as the agent:

prov:hadPlan.description: Links an Association to the Program or Workflow that was executed:
prov:hadPlan.reverse_description: The Association(s) that used this Program as a Plan:

prov:qualifiedUsage.description: Links an Execution to a detailed Usage object, which qualifies how an Entity was used:
prov:qualifiedUsage.reverse_description: The Execution this Usage event qualifies:

provone:hadInPort.description: Specifies the input Port used in a given Usage event:
provone:hadInPort.reverse_description: The Usage event(s) associated with this input Port:

prov:qualifiedGeneration.description: Links an Execution to a detailed Generation object, which qualifies how an Entity was generated:
prov:qualifiedGeneration.reverse_description: The Execution this Generation event qualifies:

provone:hadOutPort.description: Specifies the output Port used in a given Generation event:
provone:hadOutPort.reverse_description: The Generation event(s) associated with this output Port:

provone:hadEntity.description: Specifies the Entity generated in a given Generation event:
provone:hadEntity.reverse_description: The Generation event(s) in which this Entity was generated:

prov:hadMember.description: Specifies the Entity items that form part of a Collection:
prov:hadMember.reverse_description: The Collection(s) this Entity is a member of:
